Description: Body fragment of North Ionian pottery bowl; interior glazed with added red band lined in white; exterior slipped white; stopt maeander band between two friezes: above, legs of goat to left, rosette as fill; below, part of rosette asnd uncertain decoration at right break. Graffito on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.096)
